title: OCE Skin Idea: Tribal Karma
body: So people keep complaining that there's no skin for OCE yet and the argument is that it's hard to capture the diversity of the Oceanian cultures into one skin (which i agree with) but a common theme amongst each of the countries is we have indigenous tribes with brown skin and it kinda fits Karma's theme of being (sort of) tribal, spiritual etc. In terms of her outfit I was thinking maybe like clothing from some of the larger ethnicities (like maybe Aboriginal, Maori, Samoan, etc) or maybe the most distinct features from various tribes? What do you guys think?

replies.body: Maybe they should just roll with a pacific theme since most OCE region is in the pacific ocean. You have plenty of champions to cover this theme too. and it can be colourful and cool, like *hint hint* pacific fizz or nami. Could even say kog and have him all coral but he has a deep sea skin. Even like a pacific nautilus where he just has a scuba suit, flippers and snorkel.
thats only relevant to australia though not the rest of the continent

So, a skin to cover Australia, NZ, the Australasian islands, and Indonesia/Papua Naw Guinea?

_Come on._
like i said, maybe some of the larger ethnicities
Australian/European-Australians are the larger ethnic group.
We are a continent mate. You mean the rest of the regionðŸ˜‚. I think you mean that instead ðŸ˜‹
Why are people complaining there's no OCE skin? It's not like there's an EUW skin either?
Tribal? aboriginal?. kinda not the same thing  so it wouldnt be an oce skin, i can imagine a desert skin for the stereo types doe
the name can be changed cus i couldnt rly think of one maybe like indigenous or something idk im not good with names
